revision.text: __NOTOC__{{codepointer|Dynamic lights}} '''{{class|Actor}}''' native bool '''A_RemoveLight''' (Name ''lightid'') == Usage == Removes the [[dynamic light]] referenced by the specified identifier from the calling actor. Only dynamic lights attached by either {{c|[[A_AttachLight]]}} or {{c|[[A_AttachLightDef]]}} can be removed by this function, as they have the capability to assign an identifier to the attached light. === Parameters === *{{c|Name '''lightid'''}} :The identifier for the light to remove, as set by {{c|[[A_AttachLight]]}} or {{c|[[A_AttachLightDef]]}}. === Return value === Returns true if the light with the specified lightid was found and successfully removed. Otherwise returns false. == Examples == {{noexamples}}
